name: requestReadData(from:atOffset:length:readDelegate:didReadDataSelector:contextInfo:)
desc: Asynchronously reads data of a specified length from a specified offset.
declaration:
func requestReadData(from file: ICCameraFile, 
            atOffset offset: off_t, 
              length: off_t, 
        readDelegate: Any, 
 didReadDataSelector selector: Selector, 
         contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
